title: Global sulfur production by country 2019
yAxis: Price in U.S. dollars per ton
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in U.S. dollars per ton for 23 number of Countrys.
Country China has the highest Price in U.S. dollars per ton and Brazil has the lowest Price in U.S. dollars per ton.
The difference of Price in U.S. dollars per ton between the highest and lowest Country is 16900.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in U.S. dollars per ton for 23 number of Countrys.
The maximum Price in U.S. dollars per ton 17400.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Brazil where Country is 500.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in U.S. dollars per ton for 23 number of Countrys.
Country China has the highest Price in U.S. dollars per ton and Brazil has the lowest Price in U.S. dollars per ton.
The difference of Price in U.S. dollars per ton between the highest and lowest Country is 16900.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in U.S. dollars per ton for 23 number of Countrys.
The Price in U.S. dollars per ton is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Brazil.
There is a difference of 16900.0 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Brazil.
The Country China has the highest Price in U.S. dollars per ton, followed by United States, and Russia. Down to the Country Brazil which is the lowest.
Similar Price in U.S. dollars per ton is found in Country United Arab Emirates, India, and Japan.
The Country Brazil has 5.07 times less Price in U.S. dollars per ton than average.
The Price in U.S. dollars per ton is 78910.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
